EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation Labour Costs & Payment Procedure (case: {!Case.CaseNumber})
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear XXXXX,
We thank you for your price offer for the repair of the complaint {!Case.CaseNumber}.
This email can be considered as a written confirmation for the labour costs (repair DuPont™ Corian® installation) for a total of XXXXX incl. VAT.
Enclosed you will find the execution form (Customer’s Satisfaction Form for DuPont™ Corian® warranty). Please ask the end customer to sign this document, since this will be the proof for payment of your invoice. May we please ask you to execute the repair works in any case within 45 days after this confirmation? The completed, signed form as well as your invoice can be send, either directly to the DuPont™ Corian® Surfaces Warranty Centre (BI-Warranty@dupont.com) or directly to your Warranty Coordinator ({!Case.OwnerFullName}). Only after receipt of both the above mentioned documents, we will proceed to pay your invoice for the amount mentioned above.
Many thanks in advance for your help in solving this matter.
Payment Procedure Labour Costs
The DuPont address mentioned on the invoice should be: DuPont De Nemours International sarl 2, Chemin Du Pavillon Le Grand Saconnex (Genève) Switzerland (Please do NOT send the invoice to this address)
Please specify the labour cost on your invoice (Complaint-Reference, # man-hours / Person,...).
We will pay the Nett amount (without VAT)
The original invoice should be send to the below address (do NOT send to the Geneva Address): DuPont™ de Nemours (Belgium) BVBA Building Innovations - Warranty Dept.- KGB 4 Att. {!Case.OwnerFullName} - “Confidential” Antoon Spinoystraat 6 2800 Mechelen Belgium
Please ensure that you put the following information on the invoice to avoid delays in payment: Your international VAT number The name of your bank and its address (P.O. box included) IBAN and BIC code Currency Upon receipt of the original invoice, we will send the invoice to our Finance Department. Upon receipt the Finance Department will organize your payment according your terms of payment.
We thank you for your co-operation.
With kind regards,
{!Case.OwnerFullName} DuPont Building Innovations {!Case.OwnerTitle} Tel: {!Case.OwnerPhone} Email: {!Case.OwnerEmail} www.corian.com
